# aextras

Extras for [aframer](https://aframer.john-coene.com/).

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/aextras")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(aframer)
library(aextras)

embed_aframe(
  a_scene(
    a_ocean(
      width="50", depth="50", density="40"
    )
  )
)
```
